experiences.description: Mentor students in programming and computer science fundamentals, tailor lesson plans to suit individual learner needs, track progress using performance analytics, encourage logical problem-solving through hands-on exercises

Lead the editorial team to produce alumni-centered content, manage newsletters and event coverage, mentor junior writers, ensure editorial quality and timely delivery of publications, coordinate with alumni for interviews and testimonials

Develop responsive UI components for AI-integrated tools, build and consume REST APIs, collaborate with product teams to refine UX, ensure scalability and code optimization for fast performance, maintain Git version control workflows

Built Virtual Braj Museum web app with immersive VR features, implemented interactive maps and 360° experiences using Three.js, applied lazy loading for performance optimization, followed Agile and SDLC methodologies, collaborated with historians to maintain cultural accuracy

Conducted market research for lead generation, assisted in CRM automation and campaign design, analyzed funnel performance to boost conversions, supported the senior team in strategy meetings, contributed to social media and outreach content

projects.name: Stuti
projects.description: An agile, voice-activated assistive AI agent built for Gantavya's operational workflows, handles task execution, calendar scheduling, and contextual command processing, enhances accessibility and productivity through multimodal AI interactions

projects.name: Trade It Up
projects.description: A high-end, real-time trading platform designed for elite collectors, enables secure buy/sell of rare antiques with a verified ownership model, features live bidding, escrow smart contracts, and dynamic price tracking

projects.name: Virtual Braj Museum
projects.description: A 360° VR-powered museum that globally showcases Braj’s rich cultural heritage, includes interactive maps, panoramic exhibits, and historical timelines, accessible across devices with lazy loading for performance

projects.name: Braj Estate
projects.description: An intuitive real-estate platform for the Braj region to BUY, SELL & RENT properties, integrates property listing management, location filters, and inquiry tracking with a clean UI

projects.name: Style Sync
projects.description: A smart style advisor that recommends outfits based on body type and personality, combines fashion data analysis with preference learning to build personalized styling experiences

projects.name: Python Mastery
projects.description: A 120-day structured roadmap to learn Python from scratch to advanced topics, includes curated resources, 50+ projects, and chatbot development tutorials for practical application

projects.name: OOPs its DSA
projects.description: My comprehensive DSA and interview preparation initiative featuring a structured tracksheet, handpicked questions, and 200+ Leetcode problems solved in C, C++, Java, Python, TypeScript, and C#

projects.name: D Web Tech
projects.description: A 365-day learning journey covering everything from basics of HTML, CSS, JS to full-stack technologies including Frontend Frameworks, Backend APIs, Databases, DevOps, Cloud, and AI integration

projects.name: My Family
projects.description: A deeply personal digital storytelling project using creative code and visuals to represent emotional connections, combines animations, family tree logic, and poetic data visualizations
